trans-unit.source: Provides a simple, programmatically controlled HTTP protocol listener.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder en enkel, programmatisk kontrollert HTTP-protokollen lytter.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan ikke arves.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.HttpListener"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Net.HttpListener"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Before using the instance returned by this constructor, you must invoke its <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Start%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Før du bruker forekomsten ble returnert av denne konstruktøren, må du aktivere den <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Start%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Start%2A>

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be used on the current operating system.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan ikke brukes i det gjeldende operativsystemet.

trans-unit.source: Windows Server 2003 or Windows XP SP2 is required to use instances of this class.
trans-unit.target: Windows Server 2003 eller Windows XP SP2 kreves for å bruke forekomster av denne klassen.

trans-unit.source: Shuts down the <xref href="System.Net.HttpListener"></xref> object immediately, discarding all currently queued requests.
trans-unit.target: Avsluttes den <xref href="System.Net.HttpListener"> </xref> objekt umiddelbart, forkaster alle for øyeblikket i kø forespørsler.

trans-unit.source: This method disposes of all resources held by this listener.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden disposes for alle ressurser holdes av denne lytteren.

trans-unit.source: Any pending requests are unable to complete.
trans-unit.target: Alle ventende forespørsler er ikke fullført.

trans-unit.source: After calling this method, you will receive an <xref:System.ObjectDisposedException> if you attempt to use this <xref:System.Net.HttpListener>.
trans-unit.target: Etter kalle denne metoden, får du en <xref:System.ObjectDisposedException>Hvis du prøver å bruke denne <xref:System.Net.HttpListener>.</xref:System.Net.HttpListener> </xref:System.ObjectDisposedException>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the scheme used to authenticate clients.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir skjemaet brukes til å godkjenne klienter.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> uses the specified scheme to authenticate all incoming requests.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.HttpListener>bruker angitte skjemaet for å godkjenne alle innkommende forespørsler.</xref:System.Net.HttpListener>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.GetContext%2A> and <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.EndGetContext%2A> methods return an incoming client request only if the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> successfully authenticates the request.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.GetContext%2A>og <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.EndGetContext%2A>metoder returnere en innkommende klientforespørsel bare hvis det <xref:System.Net.HttpListener>godkjenner ble forespørselen.</xref:System.Net.HttpListener> </xref:System.Net.HttpListener.EndGetContext%2A> </xref:System.Net.HttpListener.GetContext%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can interrogate the identity of a successfully authenticated client by using the <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerContext.User%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan kontrollerer identiteten til en klient som ble godkjent ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerContext.User%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Net.HttpListenerContext.User%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If you want an <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> object to use different authentication mechanisms based on characteristics of the requests it receives (for example, the request's <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerRequest.Url%2A> or <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerRequest.UserHostName%2A> property), you must implement a method that chooses the authentication scheme.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil bruke en <xref:System.Net.HttpListener>objekt for å bruke annen godkjenningsmekanismer basert på egenskapene til forespørsler mottas (for eksempel i forespørselen <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerRequest.Url%2A>eller <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerRequest.UserHostName%2A>egenskapen), må du implementere en metode som velger godkjenningsskjemaet.</xref:System.Net.HttpListenerRequest.UserHostName%2A> </xref:System.Net.HttpListenerRequest.Url%2A> </xref:System.Net.HttpListener>

trans-unit.source: For instructions about how to do this, see the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.AuthenticationSchemeSelectorDelegate%2A> property documentation.
trans-unit.target: For instruksjoner om hvordan du gjør dette, kan du se den <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.AuthenticationSchemeSelectorDelegate%2A>egenskapen dokumentasjon.</xref:System.Net.HttpListener.AuthenticationSchemeSelectorDelegate%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To set this property to enable Digest, NTLM, or Negotiate requires the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission>, <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > For å angi denne egenskapen for å aktivere sammendragsgodkjenning, NTLM eller forhandle krever <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission> <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref:System.Net.AuthenticationSchemes> enumeration values that indicates how clients are to be authenticated.
trans-unit.target: En bitvis kombinasjon av <xref:System.Net.AuthenticationSchemes>nummereringsverdier som angir hvordan klienter er godkjent.</xref:System.Net.AuthenticationSchemes>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.Net.AuthenticationSchemes>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref:System.Net.AuthenticationSchemes>.</xref:System.Net.AuthenticationSchemes>

trans-unit.source: This object has been closed.
trans-unit.target: Dette objektet er lukket.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the delegate called to determine the protocol used to authenticate clients.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir representanten kalles for å finne ut protokollen som brukes til å godkjenne klienter.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you want the same authentication protocol to be used for all requests handled by a particular instance of <xref:System.Net.HttpListener>, you do not need to set this property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE]> Hvis du vil ha samme godkjenningsprotokollen som skal brukes for alle forespørsler som behandles av en bestemt forekomst av <xref:System.Net.HttpListener>, trenger du ikke vil angi denne egenskapen.</xref:System.Net.HttpListener>

trans-unit.source: To specify a protocol to be used for all client requests, use the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.AuthenticationSchemes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi en protokollen som skal brukes for alle klientforespørsler, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.AuthenticationSchemes%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Net.HttpListener.AuthenticationSchemes%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the client has not specified authentication information in its headers, the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> calls the specified delegate for each unauthenticated incoming request to determine which, if any, protocol to use to authenticate the client.
trans-unit.target: Hvis klienten ikke er angitt godkjenningsinformasjon i overskriftene i <xref:System.Net.HttpListener>kaller angitte representanten for hver uautorisert innkommende forespørselen for å bestemme som eventuelt protokollen skal brukes til å godkjenne klienten.</xref:System.Net.HttpListener>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.GetContext%2A> and <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.EndGetContext%2A> methods return an incoming request only if the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> successfully authenticated the request.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.GetContext%2A>og <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.EndGetContext%2A>metoder returnere en innkommende forespørsel hvis den <xref:System.Net.HttpListener>godkjent forespørselen.</xref:System.Net.HttpListener> </xref:System.Net.HttpListener.EndGetContext%2A> </xref:System.Net.HttpListener.GetContext%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a request cannot be authenticated, the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> automatically sends back a 401 response.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en forespørsel ikke kan godkjennes, den <xref:System.Net.HttpListener>automatisk sender tilbake svar 401.</xref:System.Net.HttpListener>

trans-unit.source: You can get the identity of a successfully authenticated client using the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.LogonUserIdentity%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Du får identiteten til en klient som ble godkjent bruker den <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.LogonUserIdentity%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.LogonUserIdentity%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The ability to delegate the choice of authentication protocol to an application-specific method is useful if you want an instance of <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> to use different authentication protocols depending on the characteristics of the requests it receives (for example, the request's <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerRequest.Url%2A> or <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerRequest.UserHostAddress%2A> property).
trans-unit.target: Muligheten for å delegere valget av godkjenningsprotokollen som en metode for Programspesifikk er nyttig hvis du vil bruke en forekomst av <xref:System.Net.HttpListener>å bruke annen protokollene avhengig av egenskaper for forespørsler mottas (for eksempel i forespørselen <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerRequest.Url%2A>eller <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerRequest.UserHostAddress%2A>egenskapen).</xref:System.Net.HttpListenerRequest.UserHostAddress%2A> </xref:System.Net.HttpListenerRequest.Url%2A> </xref:System.Net.HttpListener>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To set this property to enable Digest, NTLM, or Negotiate requires the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission>, <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > For å angi denne egenskapen for å aktivere sammendragsgodkjenning, NTLM eller forhandle krever <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission> <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Net.AuthenticationSchemeSelector"></xref> delegate that invokes the method used to select an authentication protocol.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Net.AuthenticationSchemeSelector"> </xref> representanten som aktiverer metoden som brukes til å velge en godkjenningsprotokoll.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This object has been closed.
trans-unit.target: Dette objektet er lukket.

trans-unit.source: Begins asynchronously retrieving an incoming request.
trans-unit.target: Starter asynkront henting av en innkommende forespørsel.

trans-unit.source: The BeginGetContext method begins an asynchronous (non-blocking) call to receive incoming client requests.
trans-unit.target: Metoden BeginGetContext starter et asynkront (ikke-blokkerende)-kall å motta innkommende klientforespørsler.

trans-unit.source: Before calling this method, you must call the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Start%2A> method and add at least one Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) prefix to listen for by adding the URI strings to the <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerPrefixCollection> returned by the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Prefixes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Før du kaller opp denne metoden, må du kalle den <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Start%2A>metoden og legge til minst én identifikator URI (Uniform Resource) prefiks for å lytte etter ved å legge til URI-strenger for å den <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerPrefixCollection>returnert av den <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Prefixes%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Prefixes%2A> </xref:System.Net.HttpListenerPrefixCollection> </xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Start%2A>

trans-unit.source: The asynchronous operation must be completed by calling the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.EndGetContext%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Den asynkrone operasjonen må være fullført kaller den <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.EndGetContext%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Net.HttpListener.EndGetContext%2A>

trans-unit.source: Typically, the method is invoked by the `callback` delegate.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis metoden startes av den `callback` delegere.

trans-unit.source: This method does not block while the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden ikke blokkere når operasjonen er fullført.

trans-unit.source: To get an incoming request and block until the operation completes, call the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.GetContext%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du trenger en innkommende forespørselen og blokkerer før operasjonen er fullført, kan du kalle den <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.GetContext%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Net.HttpListener.GetContext%2A>

trans-unit.source: For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer detaljert informasjon om hvordan du bruker asynkrone programming modellen [kaller asynkront synkron metoder](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate that references the method to invoke when a client request is available.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.AsyncCallback>representanten som refererer til metoden som skal startes når en klientforespørsel er tilgjengelig.</xref:System.AsyncCallback>

trans-unit.source: A user-defined object that contains information about the operation.
trans-unit.target: Et brukerdefinert objekt som inneholder informasjon om operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: This object is passed to the `callback` delegate when the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: Dette objektet er sendt til den `callback` delegere når operasjonen er fullført.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IAsyncResult> object that indicates the status of the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.IAsyncResult>objekt som angir statusen for den asynkrone operasjonen.</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: A Win32 function call failed.
trans-unit.target: Et Win32-funksjonskall mislyktes.

trans-unit.source: Check the exception's <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerException.ErrorCode*> property to determine the cause of the exception.
trans-unit.target: Kontroller unntaket <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerException.ErrorCode*>til å fastslå årsaken til unntaket.</xref:System.Net.HttpListenerException.ErrorCode*>

trans-unit.source: This object has not been started or is currently stopped.
trans-unit.target: Dette objektet er ikke startet eller er stoppet.

trans-unit.source: This object is closed.
trans-unit.target: Dette objektet er lukket.

trans-unit.source: Shuts down the <xref href="System.Net.HttpListener"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Avsluttes den <xref href="System.Net.HttpListener"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: After calling this method, you can no longer use the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> object.
trans-unit.target: Etter kalle denne metoden, kan du ikke lenger bruke den <xref:System.Net.HttpListener>objektet.</xref:System.Net.HttpListener>

trans-unit.source: To temporarily pause an <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> object, use the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Stop%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Å stanse midlertidig en <xref:System.Net.HttpListener>objekt, bruker du den <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Stop%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Stop%2A> </xref:System.Net.HttpListener>

trans-unit.source: This method shut downs the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> object without processing queued requests.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden Avslutt for filtre i <xref:System.Net.HttpListener>objektet uten å behandle forespørsler i kø.</xref:System.Net.HttpListener>

trans-unit.source: Any pending requests are unable to complete.
trans-unit.target: Alle ventende forespørsler er ikke fullført.

trans-unit.source: Gets a default list of Service Provider Names (SPNs) as determined by registered prefixes.
trans-unit.target: Henter en standardliste over tjenesten Leverandørnavn (SPNer) i henhold til registrerte prefikser.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ServiceNameCollection"></xref> that contains a list of SPNs.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ServiceNameCollection"> </xref> som inneholder en liste over SPNer.

trans-unit.source: Completes an asynchronous operation to retrieve an incoming client request.
trans-unit.target: Fullfører en asynkron operasjon for å hente en innkommende klientforespørselen.

trans-unit.source: The EndGetContext method is called, usually within an application-defined callback method invoked by a delegate, to obtain the <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerContext> object that contains an incoming client request and its associated response.
trans-unit.target: Metoden EndGetContext kalles, vanligvis i en Programdefinert tilbakekallmetode aktiveres av representant ikke hente den <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerContext>objekt som inneholder en innkommende klientforespørsel og det tilknyttede svaret.</xref:System.Net.HttpListenerContext>

trans-unit.source: This method completes an operation previously started by calling the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.BeginGetContext%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er en operasjon startet tidligere ved å kalle den <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.BeginGetContext%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Net.HttpListener.BeginGetContext%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the operation has not completed, this method blocks until it does.
trans-unit.target: Hvis operasjonen ikke er fullført, som denne metoden før det gjøres.

trans-unit.source: Because calling the EndGetContext method requires the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> object, this object is typically passed into a callback method by using the state object passed into the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.BeginGetContext%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Fordi EndGetContext-metoden krever den <xref:System.Net.HttpListener>objektet, dette objektet vanligvis er sendt til en tilbakeringing metode av ved hjelp av tilstanden-objektet som ble sendt til den <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.BeginGetContext%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Net.HttpListener.BeginGetContext%2A> </xref:System.Net.HttpListener>

trans-unit.source: You can obtain this state object by using the <xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState%2A> property of the `asyncResult` object.
trans-unit.target: Du kan finne tilstanden objektet ved hjelp av <xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState%2A>-egenskapen til det `asyncResult` objektet.</xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState%2A>

trans-unit.source: For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer detaljert informasjon om hvordan du bruker asynkrone programming modellen [kaller asynkront synkron metoder](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IAsyncResult> object that was obtained when the asynchronous operation was started.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.IAsyncResult>objektet som ble hentet da den asynkrone operasjonen ble startet.</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Net.HttpListenerContext"></xref> object that represents the client request.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Net.HttpListenerContext"> </xref> objektet som representerer klientforespørselen.

trans-unit.source: asyncResult was not obtained by calling the method.
trans-unit.target: asyncResultkan ikke hente ved å kalle den metoden.

trans-unit.source: asyncResult is .
trans-unit.target: asyncResultis .

trans-unit.source: The EndGetContext method was already called for the specified asyncResult object.
trans-unit.target: Metoden EndGetContext allerede ble kalt for den angitte asyncResult objektet.

trans-unit.source: This object is closed.
trans-unit.target: Dette objektet er lukket.

trans-unit.source: Get or set the <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"></xref> to use for extended protection for a session.
trans-unit.target: Hente eller angi den <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"> </xref> skal brukes for Utvidet beskyttelse for en økt.

trans-unit.source: The ExtendedProtectionPolicy property is used with integrated Windows authentication to provide extended protection.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ExtendedProtectionPolicy brukes med integrert Windows-godkjenning for Utvidet beskyttelse.

trans-unit.source: The ExtendedProtectionPolicy property allows the configuration of the extended protection policy for the whole <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> session.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ExtendedProtectionPolicy tillater konfigurasjon av policy for Utvidet beskyttelse for hele <xref:System.Net.HttpListener>økten.</xref:System.Net.HttpListener>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.ExtendedProtectionSelectorDelegate%2A> property allows the configuration of the extended protection policy for each individual request.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.ExtendedProtectionSelectorDelegate%2A>egenskapen tillater konfigurasjon av policy for Utvidet beskyttelse for hver enkelt forespørsel.</xref:System.Net.HttpListener.ExtendedProtectionSelectorDelegate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.CustomChannelBinding%2A> property must be `null`.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.CustomChannelBinding%2A>egenskapen må være `null`.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.CustomChannelBinding%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> instance gets the Channel Binding Token (CBT) directly from its own TLS session if there is one.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.HttpListener>forekomsten henter den kanal Binding Token Instruktører direkte fra sin egen TLS-økt Hvis det finnes en.</xref:System.Net.HttpListener>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"></xref> that specifies the policy to use for extended protection.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"> </xref> som angir policyen som skal brukes for Utvidet beskyttelse.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set the ExtendedProtectionPolicy property, but the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.CustomChannelBinding*> property was not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Forsøk på å angi egenskapen ExtendedProtectionPolicy men <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.CustomChannelBinding*>Finner ikke <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.CustomChannelBinding*>

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set the ExtendedProtectionPolicy property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Forsøk på å angi egenskapen ExtendedProtectionPolicy <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set the ExtendedProtectionPolicy property after the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Start*> method was already called.
trans-unit.target: Forsøk på å angi egenskapen ExtendedProtectionPolicy etter den <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Start*>metoden allerede ble kalt.</xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Start*>

trans-unit.source: This object is closed.
trans-unit.target: Dette objektet er lukket.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.PolicyEnforcement*> property was set to <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement"></xref> on a platform that does not support extended protection.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.PolicyEnforcement*>-egenskap er satt til <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement"> </xref> på en plattform som ikke støtter Utvidet beskyttelse.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.PolicyEnforcement*>

trans-unit.source: Get or set the delegate called to determine the <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"></xref> to use for each request.
trans-unit.target: Hente eller angi representanten kalles for å finne ut av <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"> </xref> skal brukes for hver forespørsel.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.ExtendedProtectionPolicy%2A> property is used with integrated Windows authentication to provide extended protection.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.ExtendedProtectionPolicy%2A>egenskapen brukes med integrert Windows-godkjenning for Utvidet beskyttelse.</xref:System.Net.HttpListener.ExtendedProtectionPolicy%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.ExtendedProtectionPolicy%2A> property allows the configuration of the extended protection policy for the whole <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> session.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.ExtendedProtectionPolicy%2A>egenskapen tillater konfigurasjon av policy for Utvidet beskyttelse for hele <xref:System.Net.HttpListener>økten.</xref:System.Net.HttpListener> </xref:System.Net.HttpListener.ExtendedProtectionPolicy%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ExtendedProtectionSelectorDelegate property allows the configuration of the extended protection policy per individual request.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ExtendedProtectionSelectorDelegate tillater konfigurasjon av policy for Utvidet beskyttelse per individuelle forespørselen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.CustomChannelBinding%2A> property must be `null`.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.CustomChannelBinding%2A>egenskapen må være `null`.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.CustomChannelBinding%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> instance gets the Channel Binding Token (CBT) directly from its own TLS session if there is one.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.HttpListener>forekomsten henter den kanal Binding Token Instruktører direkte fra sin egen TLS-økt Hvis det finnes en.</xref:System.Net.HttpListener>

trans-unit.source: For each request, the delegate can choose the settings that the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> instance will use to provide extended protection.
trans-unit.target: For hver forespørsel representanten kan velge innstillingene som den <xref:System.Net.HttpListener>forekomsten vil bruke for Utvidet beskyttelse.</xref:System.Net.HttpListener>

trans-unit.source: If a delegate returns `null` for this property, this represents a <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy> which the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.PolicyEnforcement%2A> property set to <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en representant returnerer `null` for denne egenskapen dette representerer en <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy>som <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.PolicyEnforcement%2A>egenskapen satt til <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement>.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.PolicyEnforcement%2A> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"></xref> that specifies the policy to use for extended protection.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"> </xref> som angir policyen som skal brukes for Utvidet beskyttelse.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set the ExtendedProtectionSelectorDelegate property, but the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.CustomChannelBinding*> property must be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Forsøk på å angi egenskapen ExtendedProtectionSelectorDelegate men <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.CustomChannelBinding*>egenskapen må være <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.CustomChannelBinding*>

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set the ExtendedProtectionSelectorDelegate property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Forsøk på å angi egenskapen ExtendedProtectionSelectorDelegate <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set the ExtendedProtectionSelectorDelegate property after the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Start*> method was already called.
trans-unit.target: Forsøk på å angi egenskapen ExtendedProtectionSelectorDelegate etter den <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Start*>metoden allerede ble kalt.</xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Start*>

trans-unit.source: This object is closed.
trans-unit.target: Dette objektet er lukket.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set the ExtendedProtectionSelectorDelegate property on a platform that does not support extended protection.
trans-unit.target: Forsøkte å angi egenskapen ExtendedProtectionSelectorDelegate på en plattform som ikke støtter Utvidet beskyttelse.

trans-unit.source: Waits for an incoming request and returns when one is received.
trans-unit.target: Venter på en innkommende forespørsel, og returnerer når en mottas.

trans-unit.source: Before calling this method, you must call the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Start%2A> method and add at least one URI prefix to listen for by adding the URI strings to the <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerPrefixCollection> returned by the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Prefixes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Før du kaller opp denne metoden, må du kalle den <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Start%2A>metoden og legge til minst én URI-prefiks for å lytte etter ved å legge til URI-strenger for å den <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerPrefixCollection>returnert av den <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Prefixes%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Prefixes%2A> </xref:System.Net.HttpListenerPrefixCollection> </xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Start%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a detailed description of prefixes, see the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> class overview.
trans-unit.target: En detaljert beskrivelse av prefiks, kan du se den <xref:System.Net.HttpListener>klassen oversikt.</xref:System.Net.HttpListener>

trans-unit.source: This method blocks while waiting for an incoming request.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden blokker under venting på en innkommende forespørsel.

trans-unit.source: If you want incoming requests to be processed asynchronously (on separate threads) so that your application does not block, use the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.BeginGetContext%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil innkommende forespørsler til behandles asynkront (på separate tråder) slik at programmet ikke blokkere, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.BeginGetContext%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Net.HttpListener.BeginGetContext%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Net.HttpListenerContext"></xref> object that represents a client request.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Net.HttpListenerContext"> </xref> objektet som representerer en klientforespørsel.

trans-unit.source: A Win32 function call failed.
trans-unit.target: Et Win32-funksjonskall mislyktes.

trans-unit.source: Check the exception's <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerException.ErrorCode*> property to determine the cause of the exception.
trans-unit.target: Kontroller unntaket <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerException.ErrorCode*>til å fastslå årsaken til unntaket.</xref:System.Net.HttpListenerException.ErrorCode*>

trans-unit.source: This object has not been started or is currently stopped.
trans-unit.target: Dette objektet er ikke startet eller er stoppet.

trans-unit.source: -or- The <xref href="System.Net.HttpListener"></xref> does not have any Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) prefixes to respond to.
trans-unit.target: - eller - <xref href="System.Net.HttpListener"> </xref> ikke har noen ID URI (Uniform Resource) prefikser å svare på.

trans-unit.source: See Remarks.
trans-unit.target: Se kommentarer.

trans-unit.source: This object is closed.
trans-unit.target: Dette objektet er lukket.

trans-unit.source: Waits for an incoming request as an asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: Venter på en innkommende forespørsel som en asynkron operasjon.

trans-unit.source: This operation will not block.
trans-unit.target: Denne operasjonen blokkere ikke.

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> object will complete when the incoming request has been received.
trans-unit.target: Det returnerte <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601>objektet fullfører når den innkommende forespørselen er mottatt.</xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601>

trans-unit.source: Before calling this method, you must call the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Start%2A> method and add at least one URI prefix to listen for by adding the URI strings to the <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerPrefixCollection> returned by the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Prefixes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Før du kaller opp denne metoden, må du kalle den <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Start%2A>metoden og legge til minst én URI-prefiks for å lytte etter ved å legge til URI-strenger for å den <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerPrefixCollection>returnert av den <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Prefixes%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Prefixes%2A> </xref:System.Net.HttpListenerPrefixCollection> </xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Start%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a detailed description of prefixes, see the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> class overview.
trans-unit.target: En detaljert beskrivelse av prefiks, kan du se den <xref:System.Net.HttpListener>klassen oversikt.</xref:System.Net.HttpListener>

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601>.

trans-unit.source: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: Oppgaveobjektet som representerer den asynkrone operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601.Result%2A> property on the task object returns an <xref href="System.Net.HttpListenerContext"></xref> object that represents a client request.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601.Result%2A> egenskap i oppgaveobjektet returnerer en <xref href="System.Net.HttpListenerContext"> </xref> objektet som representerer en klientforespørsel.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref:System.Boolean> value that specifies whether your application receives exceptions that occur when an <xref href="System.Net.HttpListener"></xref> sends the response to the client.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en <xref:System.Boolean>verdi som angir om programmet mottar unntak som skjer når en <xref href="System.Net.HttpListener"> </xref> sender svar til klienten.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Set this property to `true` if your application does not require that a response is successfully sent to each client.
trans-unit.target: Sett denne egenskapen til `true` Hvis programmet ikke krever at svar ble sendt til hver klient.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this <xref href="System.Net.HttpListener"></xref> should not return exceptions that occur when sending the response to the client; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis <xref href="System.Net.HttpListener"> </xref> skal ikke returnere unntak som skjer når sending av svaret til klienten; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This object has been closed.
trans-unit.target: Dette objektet er lukket.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether <xref href="System.Net.HttpListener"></xref> has been started.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om <xref href="System.Net.HttpListener"> </xref> er startet.

trans-unit.source: To start an <xref:System.Net.HttpListener>, call the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Start%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Å starte en <xref:System.Net.HttpListener>, kalle den <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Start%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Start%2A> </xref:System.Net.HttpListener>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Net.HttpListener"></xref> was started; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Net.HttpListener"> </xref> ble startet; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether <xref href="System.Net.HttpListener"></xref> can be used with the current operating system.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om <xref href="System.Net.HttpListener"> </xref> kan bare brukes med det gjeldende operativsystemet.

trans-unit.source: This class is available only on computers running the Windows XP SP2 or Windows Server 2003 operating systems.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen er tilgjengelig bare på datamaskiner som kjører Windows XP SP2 eller Windows Server 2003 operativsystemer.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref href="System.Net.HttpListener"></xref> is supported; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis <xref href="System.Net.HttpListener"> </xref> er støttet; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) prefixes handled by this <xref href="System.Net.HttpListener"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter identifikator URI (Uniform Resource) prefiksene behandles av dette <xref href="System.Net.HttpListener"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The prefixes are in canonical form.
trans-unit.target: Prefikser er i kanoniske form.

trans-unit.source: For a detailed description of prefixes, see the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> class overview.
trans-unit.target: En detaljert beskrivelse av prefiks, kan du se den <xref:System.Net.HttpListener>klassen oversikt.</xref:System.Net.HttpListener>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Net.HttpListenerPrefixCollection"></xref> that contains the URI prefixes that this <xref href="System.Net.HttpListener"></xref> object is configured to handle.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Net.HttpListenerPrefixCollection"> </xref> som inneholder URIEN prefixes som denne <xref href="System.Net.HttpListener"> </xref> objektet er konfigurert til å behandle.

trans-unit.source: This object has been closed.
trans-unit.target: Dette objektet er lukket.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the realm, or resource partition, associated with this <xref href="System.Net.HttpListener"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir område eller ressurspartisjon, og som er tilknyttet denne <xref href="System.Net.HttpListener"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Servers use realms to partition protected resources; each partition can have its own authentication scheme and/or authorization database.
trans-unit.target: Servere bruker områder til å dele beskyttede ressurser. hver partisjon kan ha sin egen godkjenning skjemaet og/eller godkjenning database.

trans-unit.source: Realms are used only for basic and digest authentication.
trans-unit.target: Områder brukes bare for enkel og digest-godkjenning.

trans-unit.source: After a client successfully authenticates, the authentication is valid for all resources in a given realm.
trans-unit.target: Når en klient godkjenner ble, er godkjenningen gyldig for alle ressurser i et angitt område.

trans-unit.source: For a detailed description of realms, see RFC 2617 at [http://www.ietf.org](http://www.ietf.org).
trans-unit.target: Hvis en detaljert beskrivelse av områder, kan du se RFC 2617 på [http://www.ietf.org](http://www.ietf.org).

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> has only one associated realm.
trans-unit.target: En forekomst av <xref:System.Net.HttpListener>har bare én tilknyttede område.</xref:System.Net.HttpListener>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> value that contains the name of the realm associated with the <xref href="System.Net.HttpListener"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.String>verdi som inneholder navnet på området som er tilknyttet den <xref href="System.Net.HttpListener"> </xref> objektet.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: This object has been closed.
trans-unit.target: Dette objektet er lukket.

trans-unit.source: Allows this instance to receive incoming requests.
trans-unit.target: Gjør denne forekomsten å motta innkommende forespørsler.

trans-unit.source: This method must be called before you call the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.GetContext%2A> or <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.BeginGetContext%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden må kalles før du kaller den <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.GetContext%2A>eller <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.BeginGetContext%2A>metode.</xref:System.Net.HttpListener.BeginGetContext%2A> </xref:System.Net.HttpListener.GetContext%2A>

trans-unit.source: After you have started an <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> object, you can use the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Stop%2A> method to stop it.
trans-unit.target: Når du har startet en <xref:System.Net.HttpListener>objektet, du kan bruke <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Stop%2A>metoden slutter det.</xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Stop%2A> </xref:System.Net.HttpListener>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If this listener instance uses https, you must install and select a Server Certificate.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis denne forekomsten av lytteren bruker https, må du installere og velge et serversertifikat.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, an <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest> query of this <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> will fail with an unexpected close of the connection.
trans-unit.target: Ellers en <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>spørringen for denne <xref:System.Net.HttpListener>mislykkes med en uventet avslutning av tilkoblingen.</xref:System.Net.HttpListener> </xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>

trans-unit.source: You can configure Server Certificates and other listener options by using HttpCfg.exe.
trans-unit.target: Du kan konfigurere serversertifikater og andre alternativer for lytteren ved hjelp av HttpCfg.exe.

trans-unit.source: See [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/http/http/httpcfg_exe.asp](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/http/http/httpcfg_exe.asp) for more details.
trans-unit.target: Se [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/http/http/httpcfg_exe.asp](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/http/http/httpcfg_exe.asp) for flere detaljer.

trans-unit.source: A Win32 function call failed.
trans-unit.target: Et Win32-funksjonskall mislyktes.

trans-unit.source: Check the exception's <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerException.ErrorCode*> property to determine the cause of the exception.
trans-unit.target: Kontroller unntaket <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerException.ErrorCode*>til å fastslå årsaken til unntaket.</xref:System.Net.HttpListenerException.ErrorCode*>

trans-unit.source: This object is closed.
trans-unit.target: Dette objektet er lukket.

trans-unit.source: Causes this instance to stop receiving incoming requests.
trans-unit.target: Gjør denne forekomsten stopper mottak innkommende forespørsler.

trans-unit.source: If this instance is already stopped, calling this method has no effect.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne forekomsten er allerede stoppet, har kaller denne metoden ingen virkning.

trans-unit.source: After you have stopped an <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> object, you can use the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Start%2A> method to restart it.
trans-unit.target: Når du har sluttet å et <xref:System.Net.HttpListener>objekt, du kan bruke <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Start%2A>metode for å starte det.</xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Start%2A> </xref:System.Net.HttpListener>

trans-unit.source: This object has been closed.
trans-unit.target: Dette objektet er lukket.

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources held by this <xref href="System.Net.HttpListener"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Frigir ressursene holdes av dette <xref href="System.Net.HttpListener"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Applications should use the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Close%2A> method instead of calling this method.
trans-unit.target: Programmer skal bruke den <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Close%2A>metoden i stedet for å kalle denne metoden.</xref:System.Net.HttpListener.Close%2A>

trans-unit.source: The timeout manager for this <xref href="System.Net.HttpListener"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Transportbehandling for tidsavbrudd for denne <xref href="System.Net.HttpListener"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: The timeout manager defines the connection timeout limits for this <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> instance.
trans-unit.target: Definerer transportbehandling for tidsavbrudd for tilkoblingen tidsavbrudd grensene for denne <xref:System.Net.HttpListener>forekomsten.</xref:System.Net.HttpListener>

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref href="System.Net.HttpListenerTimeoutManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returns <xref href="System.Net.HttpListenerTimeoutManager"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The timeout manager for this <xref href="System.Net.HttpListener"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Transportbehandling for tidsavbrudd for denne <xref href="System.Net.HttpListener"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref:System.Boolean> value that controls whether, when NTLM is used, additional requests using the same Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) connection are required to authenticate.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en <xref:System.Boolean>verdi som bestemmer om, når NTLM brukes, ekstra-forespørsler ved hjelp av samme tilkobling overføring Control Protocol (TCP) kreves for å godkjenne.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true` and the first request over a particular TCP connection is authenticated using NTLM, subsequent requests over the same TCP connection are processed using the authentication information (<xref:System.Security.Principal.IIdentity>) of the initial request.
trans-unit.target: Når denne egenskapen er satt til `true` og den første forespørselen med en bestemt TCP-tilkobling er godkjent ved hjelp av NTLM, etterfølgende forespørsler over samme TCP-tilkoblingen behandles ved hjelp av godkjenningsinformasjonen (<xref:System.Security.Principal.IIdentity>) for den første forespørselen.</xref:System.Security.Principal.IIdentity>

trans-unit.source: This property has no effect when NTLM is not the authentication protocol.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen har ingen virkning når NTLM er godkjenningsprotokollen.

trans-unit.source: When Negotiate is specified as the authentication protocol, this property has an effect only if NTLM is the actual protocol used for authentication.
trans-unit.target: Når forhandle er angitt som godkjenningsprotokoll, vil denne egenskapen har en effekt bare hvis NTLM faktiske protokollen som brukes for godkjenning.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > While setting this property to `true` increases performance because the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> does not send additional NTLM authentication challenges, there is a security risk in not requiring all requests to provide authentication information.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Under når egenskapen settes `true` øker ytelsen fordi den <xref:System.Net.HttpListener>støtter ikke sende flere NTLM godkjenningsanmodninger, er det en sikkerhetsrisiko i krever ikke alle forespørsler om å angi godkjenningsinformasjon.</xref:System.Net.HttpListener>

trans-unit.source: You must determine whether the increase in performance is worth this risk.
trans-unit.target: Du må angi om ytelse er verdt denne risikoen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Security.Principal.IIdentity> of the first request will be used for subsequent requests on the same connection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref:System.Security.Principal.IIdentity>for først forespørselen blir brukt for etterfølgende forespørsler på den samme tilkoblingen; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Security.Principal.IIdentity>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This object has been closed.
trans-unit.target: Dette objektet er lukket.
